name: Paper Pilot (itch)
description:
ArrowUp: fly up         Space: shoot        ArrowLeft: drop bomb

Just one level is playable. We are working on a full PC version.

Get full version for Android on Google Play Store or Itunes.

In Paper Pilot you fly with your plane in a unique paperworld. Shoot the obstacles that are on your way. But be careful! Your gun will very hot and overheated. Collect coins to buy new planes and upgrade them. Unlock new level and worlds with the starboxes.

features
* different planes
* planes can be upgraded
* many level in different worlds
* Google Play Services
